Dialogue.text: Aye, what do we 'ave here?
Just a walking purse, sir.
Aye, spill 'em coins then.
Ze screen text that no one will see
Aye, that should be enough.
Ye an empty purse 'pparently.
No need to posture! We surrender.
Some steel for you thieving rascals!
I hear you and your lads have been terrorizing the locals?
Impossible, m'lord! We are but humble peasants.
A thief, and a liar? Prepare to die.
Ah, I see. You may go then.
Heh, ye aren't very fortunate today, ar ye?
Oh, but my dear sir, it is said that those with coin are always granted God's blessings.
Aye, spill 'em coins then. And don't ye use 'em big words.
Ze screen text that no one will see
Aye, that should be enough.
It looks like ye only got words.
It seems so. We surrender.
Don't get cocky, rascal. A couple mountain thieves are no match for my men!
I hear you and your lads have been terrorizing the locals?
Impossible, m'lord! We are but a caravan.
Heh, do you take me for a fool?
Ah, I see. You may go then.

Dialogue.text: Stepped into the wrong woods I'm afraid.

Dialogue.text: No need to shoot! We can perhaps arrange something.
It better be a good arrangement.
Ze screen text that no one will see
Aye, that should be enough.
Ye an empty purse 'pparently.
I'm afraid you are correct. We surrender.
Oh, you should be afraid!
I hear you and your lads have been terrorizing the locals?
We'll fight until we draw our last breath!
Nothing. I wish you a good day.
Yet another adventurer playing at the art of war. You and your kind have ravaged these lands at the cost of us soldiers.
Come on now. You of all in Calradia must understand the desire to live.
Freedom has its costs.
Ze screen text that no one will see
Don't linger around.
We'll take a look at your inventory then.
Stay your hand! We surrender.
Hah! A mere rook posturing like he owns the land. Let me show you the skills of a real commander.
Die like the disloyal filth you are.
I am in no mood to deal with your pack of fools.
Beautiful weather out there to enjoy freedom, don't you think?
Indeed so. May you all enjoy your freedom for long.
Ah, it seems like you'll make another fine addition to our collection!
Stay your hand! We can pay for passage.
No need for petty exchanges like that. You can just pay with lifelong servitude.
You will taste your own poison after I am done with you!
Ah, hello, friend!
No friends here. Just steel!
You're gonna be squealing when I am done with you.
Ah, nice journeys to you, friend!
Beautiful weather out there to capture some innocent people, don't you think?
Indeed so. May your slaves be healthy and expensive!
Well, aren't you a worthy capture!
Stay your hand! We can pay for passage.
Fear not. We'll take everything you have, and have your family pay the rest.
All high and mighty, yet you are no different than a bandit!
I'll have to bring out the torture devices just for you.
Ah, hello, friend!
No friends here. Just steel!
You're gonna be squealing when I am done with you.
Ah, nice journeys to you, friend!
Beautiful weather out there for some justice, eh?
Indeed so. May your efforts be fruitful, my friend!
Yours as well, friend. Good luck out there.
I'LL MAKE TRINKETS FROM YOUR PINKY TOES!
All sinners must be purged.
How rare! A friendly face on the road
It's my pleasure! Take care. You are doing work for all mankind.
You are a sinner, and yet you are riding around with such pride.
You are a learned man, maybe even a knight. Is there no way for this to end peacefully?
Don't worry. You'll have plenty of opportunities to redeem yourself before God.
Such strength! God is testing me for certain.
How rare! A friendly face on the road
It's my pleasure! Take care. You are doing God's work.
More pestilence upon this tumultuous land. I, of the last standing Knight Order of Calradia, the Phoenix, shall ensure your swift death.
Go on then. A Knight does not fear any adversity! I shall die in honour, and laugh down on your pitiful existence from the heavens.
How rare! A friendly face on the road
It's my pleasure! Take care, sir Knight.
The rights of the people will not be denied!
If you have any honour, then stay your hand!
Disperse now, and you all shall live.
We'd rather die than go back to those so-called lords. The rights of the people will not be denied!
Very well, you all may continue.
How rare! A friendly face on the road
It's my pleasure! Take care, sir Knight.
You westerners make for some petty warriors! Prepare to die in the hand of a real soldier.
Finally, a worthy opponent!
How rare! A friendly face on the road
It's my pleasure!
